I'm positive it was the 25th. I've double-checked with all the sites 
I know of right off hand (including the www.tamahito.com site) and 
they all agree on that date. However, it should be remembered that 
there was a calender change a couple years later, so all dates are 
actually off from what they should be by about a month. That's why it 
can get so confusing. Some sites will show the "corrected" date, 
while others will show the date as it was at the time of the 
incident.  

Hm, I don't have anything to confirm this by right off hand, but I 
think the anniversary of Hijikata's death is just around the corner 
on May 11th. >_< I'd better hear some nice words for my Hijikata-sama!

-MissBehavin
